examples.full_description: create a repo without a source creates a blank repo
create a repo without a source File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_blank_repo/" should have zero files
create a repo without a source File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_blank_repo/.git" should be directory
create a repo no source but revision provided should not fail (MODULES-2125)
create a repo bare repo creates a bare repo
create a repo bare repo File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_bare_repo/config" should contain "bare = true"
create a repo bare repo File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_bare_repo/.git" should not be directory

examples.description: does not create a bare repo when a revision is defined
examples.full_description: create a repo bare repo with a revision does not create a bare repo when a revision is defined
create a repo bare repo with a revision File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_bare_repo_rev" should not be directory

examples.description: does not create a mirror repo
examples.full_description: create a repo mirror repo does not create a mirror repo
create a repo mirror repo File "/tmp/vcsrepo.KA2kNS/testrepo_mirror_repo" should not be directory
